question:
You are planning a holiday in another country and would like a friend to accompany you.
Write a letter to the friend asking him/her to join you and explain: invitation
      - Why are you taking a holiday?
      - What is your holiday plan? Explain, simples/ future
      - Why would you like him/her to go with you?
text: How things going since our last meeting? I’m writing today to invite you to be my travel partner in a journey through Brazil.

After six long months of intensive construction work days and winter coming, my boss has announced to us that the company will take a break during the whole month of december. As I know this long free time is a unique opportunity, I've decided to travel for random destinations around Brazil.

The journey will begin in Fortaleza, which I'll stay for two nights in an astonishing hostel. Then, I'm planning to ride a cheap car to start driving all over the Northeast coast of the country. The stops will include Natal, Recife, and the priceless city Maceio.  The entire journey must last for fifteen days, finishing in Salvador, where I'll take a direct flight to Vancouver.

Because you've once told to me a huge fan of soccer as well as the mind weather of the place, I thought that would be a great idea inviting you to go with me. Besides, you are such a lovely person to be around; our last experience traveling together was memorable, and I'd love having it again.
I hope you can manage to come.
